changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS billing_address ( billing_address_id bigserial not null, first_name varchar(50), middle_name varchar(50), last_name varchar(50), address1 varchar(100), address2 varchar(100), address3 varchar(100), city varchar(100), county varchar(100), state varchar(100), country varchar(50), postal_code varchar(20), phone_number varchar(25), email varchar(255), CONSTRAINT billing_address_pkey PRIMARY KEY (billing_address_id) );
